Constants
Key Strokes
ENTER

The ASCII value of the Enter Key

BACKSPACE

The ASCII value of the BACKSPACE Key

Member handling constants
MAX_LOGIN

The max Size of the Login string

MAX_PASSWORD

The max Size of the Password string

MAX_INFO_INPUT

The max Size of the Member infos strings i.e: "Firstname ,Adress , Phonenumber..."

MAX_CATEGORIE_TYPES

The max Size of the Member category string i.e: "AD" ,"K","A"

Film handling constants
MAX_FILM_CODE

The max Size of the Film code string i.e: "AAAAAA"

MAX_FILM_TITLE

The max Size of the Film Title string

Loan handling constants
MAX_DATE_SIZE

The max Size of the Current Date string i.e: "jj/mm/aa"

File handling constants
_MEMBER_INFOS_FILE

The path to the Database that holds the member personal infos i.e: "Adress,Phone ...."

_MEMBER_DATABASE_FILE

The path to the Database that holds the member credentials i.e: "Login, Password "

_FILM_DATABASE_FILE

The path to the Database that holds the Film infos infos i.e: "Title,Code ...."

_BORROWERS_DATABASE_FILE

The path to the Database that holds the Borrowers names.

_BORROWED_FILM_FILE

The path to the Database that holds the Borrowed films titles.
